overview:
Jesse Silver is a partner at the full-service advertising agency YellowHammer, where he oversees operations.

He got his start in the internet marketing space at AzoogleAds in 2007 on the publisher development team. In the Fall of 2008, Jesse left to take a position running product and business development at Super Rewards. Over the next 9 months, Jesse helped develop Super Rewards into the multi-million dollar marketing force which eventually sold to Kansas City-based internet marketing conglomerate, Adknowledge, Inc.

While at Adknowledge, Jesse assumed a role running the combined advertising sales teams for the Adknowledge social media marketing businesses, including: Super Rewards, Cubics, Social Media, Lookery, Adonomics and Media Run. Jesse played an integral role in the project design and management of Adknowledge’s Bidsytem for CPA advertisers, including facilitating the subsequent transition. Before he left, Jesse was managing a global sales and account management team of 20+, spanning 6 offices. Jesse’s areas of expertise include: publisher and advertiser business development, corporate operations and management, and project management for product development.
